siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Good friction
frontmatter.description: Good friction makes for more memorable and unusual experiences. Digital processes work to eliminate all friction, including the good points.

frontmatter.title: Uncover what's unseen
frontmatter.description: Seek out what's unseen. Develop ways to interpret this to a meaningful format for humans.

frontmatter.title: Defending data
frontmatter.description: Defend it because it has internal value, regardless of perceived value from others. Don't give opportunity for others to control vital parts. Make it more trouble than it's worth.

frontmatter.title: Humans seek a hidden meaning
frontmatter.description: Computers generally don't look beyond the surface, both a strength and weakness. Find ways to meld the two, to provide people with stories to go with information & data.
